title: Fs: T206 hal chase (white cap) psa 6!! *SOLD*

posts.post_title: Fs: T206 hal chase (white cap) psa 6!! *SOLD*
posts.post_content: Sweet cap 350 back, card is perfectly centered which is tough for this issue. Beautiful high end card. An sgc 70(5.5) just sold at goodwin for $425, detailed scans available, just shoot me your email. Priced at $495....thanks....Will sell for $425...thanks
bump. first $450 gets it! Great card for the price....Thanks
bump. final price reuction...thanks, now only $425!
